website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality option for a shampoo free of sulfates, silicone, and parabens.
pros: We loved the emphasis that Maple Holistics put on being cruelty free, as well as free of sulfates, silicone, and parabens
Tea tree scent is strong, but fades when hair is dried
Provides immediate and long lasting itch relief
Has a thicker consistency, so you don't need to use a lot
Dramatically reduces dandruff within the first few weeks of use
The tingling sensation, combined with the strong herbal scent, makes every shower feel like a relaxing spa visit
cons: Shampoo lathers decently for a sulfate free brand, but not great

customer_reviews.title: This actually works very well....
customer_reviews.text: I've had problems with dandruff related to sebhoric dermatitis since I was a kid 40 plus years ago. Nothing I've tried has helped very much and that includes the sulfur based products, ketocanozole Nizoral, etc. I've been using this almost daily for a month now and my scalp is doing better than it ever had other than when I was in the army and had no hair. This stuff works wonders and I highly recommend it. Believe me, I know the embarrassment of dandruff, and the flakes as well as that intense burning and itching that comes with the dermatitis. This stuff helps, at least in my case, immensely. I highly recommend it. Take care.
customer_reviews.author: Just Louie....

This shampoo totallly impresses me by removing dry scalp gently, cleaning and conditioning my hair well, AND it smells wonderful! I tried the conditioner also, and it’s nice. But, the shampoo works on it’s own to clean and condition. Get the conditioner if you want a cute gift set for someone. It’s a nice extra, but the shampoo really can work solo. I have been using the shampoo for 4 months.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best smell

I use this shampoo on mine and my daughters hair once a week while school is in session. I also use it if someone in my class or hers gets lice!!! So far we have been very lucky. I don't know if it's the shampoo or just luck but lice free so far!!! I'm not a fan of the smell but I don't like the tea tree oil smell. However, the smell won't keep me from using it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Waters

customer_reviews.title: Really helped my itchy scalp!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this shampoo! I started skipping hair wash day and noticed my scalp was getting really itchy between days and heard tea tree oil could help. I wish this product had a little more tea tree oil but it really helped make my scalp feel so much better! It left my hair a little dry but I used just a tiny bit of conditioner on the tops of my hair and it helped.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Stimulates your scalp and works great!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo and conditioner smell fantastic and work great. The shampoo stimulates your scalp and I feel like it promotes hair growth and healthy scalp. It’s also a clarifying shampoo and gets rid of residue - your hair will be squeaky clean and will look freshly shampooed for days. The conditioner isn’t quite as moisturizing as I need because I color my hair but my boyfriend loves it so I still gave it a good rating. I just mix a little of my other conditioner with it and am happy.
customer_reviews.author: BHeeseman

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo works just as it should. My scalp gets super dry and starts producing dandruff when I wash my hair too often. I first bought a Pure Tea Tree Oil Shampoo 2 years ago and have always kept a bottle in the shower since then. My husband and I love it but we don't use it all the time—only when we need it. Follow the instructions on the bottle, and in about 1-2 weeks of use, you will see how effective this treatment is for your dry and itchy scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Shaved Heads
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait a couple weeks before reviewing. I use clippers weekly and keep my head at a #1 guard. I have always had oily skin and scalp. You could wipe your hand across my scalp, or even pat me on the head, and your palm would be oil as heck. Not anymore. This shampoo took away the oiliness AND redness from shaving/clipping. My head is not shiny like it was before. I highly recommend this product! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.author: Short Beard

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help more than dermatology shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I am like another person who reviwed. Itchy scalp and get pimples on scalp. No dandruff. Have only used once, as just got it this week. Hair surprisingly soft. Scalp still itched some. No pimples/sores with this shampoo. So that is a win for me. Will keep using.
customer_reviews.author: pedrn

customer_reviews.title: Not miraculous but works
customer_reviews.text: I have Seborrheic dermatitis. It is a condition which tends to come and go. In other words, repeated treatments are necessary. With this condition, I cannot go without washing my hair for more than two days. I had been using anti dandruff shampoos and all of them made my condition worse. I switched to Maple Holistics Tea tree oil shampoo after getting unsatisfactory results from rest of the brands. This product definitely did not cure my condition but it helped to make it better! After every wash, my scalp feels great. It enhances my scalp for a day and half. This product is mild and soothing. To conclude it, I would say it works on my sensitive scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Khyati Kansagra

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for 1 week hoping it would be something I couldn't live without, due to all the positive reviews. I do like how it makes my scalp feel right after using it but that is short lived. My scalp goes right back to being dry and itchy. In fact, it almost seemed to aggravate my dry scalp and made things a little more irritated. Unfortunately, I had to stop using it. This product comes with the promise that your next bottle is free, in exchange for a review - I can't say that's the only reason for all the positive reviews but it certainly makes me question it. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jen S.

customer_reviews.title: Love Maple Holistics Tea Tree shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I developed an itchy scalp and tried everything and nothing worked until I started using Maple Holistics Tea Tree special formula shampoo! Makes my scalp happy, has a great cleanly feel and scent! So glad I finally found something that works!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Saved my sanity!
customer_reviews.text: I was a mom at my wits end... I had one kid with ringworm on his scalp that I was treating topically but having a hard time getting completely clear because he has really thick hair. I had another that had dry scalp due to winter time and wouldn't stop scratching her head (which makes schools very suspicious!). I bought this shampoo and immediately treated both children...there was improvement with the first use and no problems within a day or two. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Kandlelitangel

customer_reviews.title: Relief from itchy irritated scalp
customer_reviews.text: I've been suffering with such an itchy irritated scalp for a month, that I made an appt to see a doctor. I tried different kinds of soothing oils and treatments - but nothing worked. I ordered this shampoo and conditioner as a last resort after reading some reviews, and used it once today and finally have gotten relief for the first time. I'm going to cancel the dr, appt since I think maybe this will heal whatever the problems is.
customer_reviews.author: Fernside

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work. Causes dandruff.
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, but gave me dandruff and dry scalp versus taking it away. I didn’t really have a dandruff issue until using this product. I originally bought this product for a different issue going on with my scalp and hair, which it also did nothing for. Very disappointed as this isn’t a cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very poor shampoo, does nothing for dandruff
customer_reviews.text: It's very rare that I bother to write a review, but I feel compelled to in this case - this shampoo is just absolutely awful. It leaves your hair very dry, and does nothing at all to mitigate dandruff. The active ingredient here is supposed to be Tea Tree, and Tea Tree Oil is the main point of advertisement for the product - this ingredient has been shown to reduce dandruff by suppressing a kind of yeast that lives in the environment of the scalp. However, you smell almost no tea tree in this formula; instead you smell primarily rosemary, which I presume is cheaper (and as far as I know has no therapeutic properties).
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Great for acne prone skin and cooling effect.
customer_reviews.text: This was a purchase on a whim. It had promising reviews so I gave it a try because it was pretty affordable. Let's get one thing straight, you must change up your shampoo and conditioner at times to get full effects from the product. This is due to your scalp building tolerance of the product. Before use I recommend using a hair mask to get out all the junk buildup. Then use this product for a nice cooling effect and stop itchiness in it's tract. The scent is refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Sim

customer_reviews.title: Too soon to tell
customer_reviews.text: My scalp starting itching bad again a few hours after using the shampoo. I'm not giving up yet though. I figure it might take a few more shampoos to work. Until then I'll take Benadryl as it's the only thing that helps. VERY DISAPPOINTED with packaging. Bottle was not in its box and it had shampoo on the outside of the bottle. The bottle was still sealed though so I felt it was safe to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bonkers

customer_reviews.title: This shampoo really stops the itch!
customer_reviews.text: I've been plagued by excema most of my life. For the last few years I've had sebhorriac dermatitis with big flakes coming off my scalp - ugh! I used Head and Shoulders, DHS Zinc which were useless to minimally effective. So I googled, 'best shampoo for a dry, itchy scalp'. The answer was unanimousley tea tree shampoo. So I bought this one (Amazon's Choice, of course). After a couple uses the itch was gone. No more scratching my head raw and no more flakes. It leaves my hair soft and very shiney. The scent is neutral.
customer_reviews.author: FIGARO

customer_reviews.title: Bad reaction
customer_reviews.text: This made my scalp extremely itchy and caused a small bald spot in the front of my hair. This was the only product I had changed in my routine at the time so it had to have been the cause.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Mauro

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is amazing. I had troubles with my scalp for years. I was ordering before the another shampoo from Europe that was helping. Luckly it is out of stock for a long time and I decided to look for another one. After few bad choices I found this one and it's even better that the shampoo that I was using for years. I strongly recommend it and thank you for a great quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandru & Anastasia Popescu

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product while having health issues and losing more hair than usual. I think the shampoo helped with that issue, but I was also continuing to heal at the same time I started the shampoo. This was a year ago and I have not stopped using this shampoo. I love the way it makes my hair feel and look. My hair has thickened. I have recommended this shampoo to another person that had hair loss and it was well received by that person too.
customer_reviews.author: Label buyer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice experience
customer_reviews.text: I'm always looking for a really clean-feeling and clean-smelling shampoo. I just received this and was anxious to use it. It's actually very nice. First, the pleasant tea tree scent, not overpowering. Then the lather is nice, and what I really liked was the clean feel from the rinse, leaving my hair feeling super clean and soft. This is definitely going to stay on my list. Thanks for a nice product !
customer_reviews.author: MackiePa

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shampoo, Doesn't work great for Dandruff
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice shampoo. Has a good smell and makes your hair feel super clean. However, I got this specifically to work on my dry scalp/dandruff and I have yet to see much of a difference. You also have to use quite a bit of product to get it to spread through your hair. Then they recommend washing a couple of times, so you can go through the small bottle pretty quickly. Final conclusion: nice shampoo for a good clarifying hair wash, but not great for dry scalp/itch relief/dandruff prevention. Wouldn't purchase again for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Cettie

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Very oily skin paired with the sweat from daily exercise causes my scalp to break out in pimples and sores on the reg. I found that a lot of shampoos and conditioners exacerbate this problem with added scents and unidentifiable (and potentially unnatural) ingredients. I discovered Maple Holistics on a whim and decided to try their tea tree shampoo. I am so impressed by this brand and will be a loyal customer for life!T I love everything about this shampoo -- from its natural antibacterial properties, to it's scent and scalp soothing relief -- it's all good! Thank you for creating this amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Jenae

customer_reviews.title: Soothes an itchy scalp
customer_reviews.text: My scalp gets so itchy in the winter and this shampoo helped to soothe the insanity of the itching. I suspect it would work much better with a matching conditioner, but I need more moisture than most tea tree products can provide since my hair is damaged by years of coloring, so I use a different product for the extreme moisture I need. I am planning to try one by this sale company called Silk18 and I'm hoping that will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: PenGoddess

customer_reviews.title: Worked after 1st use!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. This is the fifth shampoo I have tried to control dryness and flaking and none of the others worked. This worked literally after the first wash. It smells fresh and makes my hair so clean with no buildup.
customer_reviews.author: Stickies Mum

customer_reviews.title: Great for occasional itchy scalp, would recommend deep condition after use
customer_reviews.text: This really helped my itchy scalp. My scalp has been extremely dry this winter and this shampoo helped remove buildup and flakes. I love that it’s sulfate free and has tea tree oil. It’s not as cleansing as some sulfate containing shampoos, which I expected and don’t really use it to clarify, but it’s not super moisturizing either. I use this whenever I’m feeling a little itchy or dry or notice flakiness on my clothes and it definitely helps, though I always follow with a deep condition to retain moisture. Perfect for use as needed!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Acne reduction
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an affordable shampoo that reduced the amount of acne on my scalp and this seemed to do the trick. I am what you would call someone who sweats...when I workout I sweat a lot. I would say for anyone in this situation, wait 10-20 mins post workout to shower. I have been using a shampoo first to clean out any dirt and then using this right after and having the clean suds of this shampoo sit in my hair for a couple of minutes and voila. You will feel a difference
customer_reviews.author: Glen Gulia

customer_reviews.title: Great for itchy scalp
customer_reviews.text: For the longest time I experienced itchy scalp and dandruff that showed up randomly, at the worst time possible. I discovered this shampoo while browsing amazon and ordered it without very high expectations. A week or so later, after using it a couple times, I got what other raves about - my scalp was much calmer, less itchy, and no dandruff in site. I’ve ordered it many times since then and I’m still very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Smith

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS PRODUCT, WORTH EVERY PENNY!
customer_reviews.text: NO AD* i absolutely love this product, a bit goes a long way! Initially purchased for my daughter for head lice prevention (from school outbreak) and she is lice free, her thin hair has gotten thicker and longer. I as a religious head & shoulders user, have made my swap!!!! Though the conditioner scent is not too pleasing, i will continue to use & purchase. Not to mention, their customer service is amazing as well!!!!
customer_reviews.author: norma torres

customer_reviews.title: Great natural product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to use more natural hair products for the last 6 months and this shampoo did not disappoint! I left it on for a minute like the directions said and then rinsed it out. My hair and scalp felt very moisturized and healthy. For conditioner, I just use a combination of apricot oil and other essential oils to put on my scalp. I really like this product and will definitely continue to keep purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: K. McCloud

customer_reviews.title: Greasy hair and scalp acne to beautiful healthy hair!
customer_reviews.text: I regret not taking a picture before trying this product! I totally recommend this product if you struggle with greasy hair and scalp scene because it truly helps! I typically use this product alone and once or twice a week I also use a hair conditioner mask. Great product! Smells great as well!
customer_reviews.author: alejandro perez

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I use this shampoo on my coarse, curly hair to help with dandruff. I really appreciate how gentle it is; it does not dry out my hair like Head and Shoulders and it cleans well. It is unscented, which I appreciate as well. Sometimes I bleach my hair and I use this on that and it helps the color stay longer - much longer than using a different shampoo as again it is very gentle. Overall highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M. McGraw

customer_reviews.title: So far, it's great
customer_reviews.text: While the smell is a little on the strong side, I don't mind much as it doesn't stick to the hair after it's dry. I bought this to help treat my daughter's eczema on her scalp. We have only used it a few times, but I can tell it has been moisturizing and her flaking skin has gone done some already. I'm looking forward to continuing using it and see more improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Hairson

customer_reviews.title: This shampoo is refreshing
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo is refreshing, invigorating and smells great! My hair does well with this but my dandruff is NOT gone after 3 weeks of use. Head and shoulders makes that issue disappear within 2 washes..
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: It's Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I received the request for review 2 days after I received the product. I used it for the first time last night. I can't really comment on if it's going to help with itching, since one use didn't help yet. I can only say that I did get it, it smells nice, and it does lather up, so 3 stars at this point. I'll update after a few weeks if it helps. Maybe they oughta give us time to try a product before begging for a review?
customer_reviews.author: Chaplain Dan

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this product yesterday. With one wash, my hair feels more luxurious, more dense, and healthier. I can’t say that it feels less itchy yet, but there is definitely less flakiness than yesterday. I wash my hair at night and by the morning I’ll have tons of flakiness, and there’s almost none of that this morning. Product instructs you to wash twice per use, so I may continue doing that for a bit and then just wash once per use and see what happens. So far I’m happy with this product and don’t feel anxious over wearing black today.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Good shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have severely itchy scalp. It didn't seem to help with that, but I have yet to find anything that does. It is great shampoo though and makes your hair feel soft and healthy. A little bit goes a long way so it will last me a long time. So great to know that I'm using a product free of harsh chemicals with ingredients that won't harm my hair.
customer_reviews.author: P Folsom

customer_reviews.title: Bad itch
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this shampoo gave me real bad itch more than before! I don’t have that much dandruff just lightly but the itch was super intense that I had to do another shampoo and put oil in my roots to calm it down! It wasn’t suitable for my scalp
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I like this shampoo for my dry scalp, which I have had on off since a child. It also did a better job than clarifying shampoo in getting rid of some sticky residue in one spot of my hair. Several washes with clarifying shampoo did not get it out, one wash with this shampoo did the trick. The scent is very "tea Tree" but I actually like it. Hair is soft and smells fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Katie LC

customer_reviews.title: Soothing
customer_reviews.text: The smell is weird, but I'm not someone that is typically into lavender and rosemary. It does exactly what I was hoping it would which is soothe a repetitive sore spot that keeps popping up on my scalp due to an annoying condition that shall remain nameless. I have long thick hair and it didn't take more than a silver dollar sized amount to get a really nice lather throughout, I didn't notice a "stringy" feeling after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if the ingredients in some other shampoos made my scalp sensitive, but for some reason lately I started getting itchy and redness after using anti-dandruff shampoos, and this shampoo helped with the redness and itchiness. It worked for a bit, but now my forehead started getting scaly and my head started to itchy worst. I was constantly scratching my head. I stopped using it and switched to an aloe shampoo instead.
customer_reviews.author: Francis T.

customer_reviews.title: Great for an irritated scalp
customer_reviews.text: I live where it's hot all year, and my scalp at my neckline was getting irritated from the heat and sweating. I bought this to help calm that irritation, and it has helped so much. I have long, color treated hair, and it hasn't stripped my color at all. My hair looks and feels healthy. The bottle I got has lasted surprisingly long, and I'll be repurchasing when it runs out.
customer_reviews.author: BamaRN

customer_reviews.title: I love this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I have something wrong with my scalp and it's itchy all the time and smells if I don't wash my hair everyday. I have medicated shampoo, but sometimes I like to wash with something that smells better. This shampoo calms my itch, lathers nicely, and smells fresh. I color my hair but haven't noticed any damage to the color or extra dryness in my hair. I always use a good conditioner as well.
customer_reviews.author: chica

customer_reviews.title: Nice natural scent for any sex or gender
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product due to itchiness and hair loss. I don't think I used it frequently enough to produce results. I was diagnosed with alopecia and not a fungus which I was hoping for and also may be why this product didn't prevent my symptoms. The itchiness was reduced but didn't take it away completely. The lather is great for this product. The scent is natural and not overpowering like I expected a tea tree oil shampoo to be. It is very unisex. I would say it is not too masculine for a female but also not a feminine scent.
customer_reviews.author: Artsy garage

customer_reviews.title: Easy win
customer_reviews.text: This is my new go-to shampoo. I’m transitioning all my personal care products to cruelty-free, vegan options and it’s nice to have an easy win with this one. I have very sensitive skin and thick, long, wavy, graying hair. This smells good and keeps both my hair and scalp in excellent shape. I also like that it’s concentrated so a bottle lasts for ages.
customer_reviews.author: emewilli

customer_reviews.title: Great product for its intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: I purchased both the shampoo and conditioner and I absolutely love them. I’ve found out that I have seborrheic dermatitis, my scalp tends to get super dry to when it can get itchy & flaky, it gets worse in winter. I’ve tried multiple brands including name brands that cost an arm and a leg. While they might help a little, they don’t last long. This is probably one of the only shampoos that gives me the relief. I enjoy the mild cooling sensation on my scalp. The packaging could be better to release the product out but not a deal breaker
customer_reviews.author: LLW

customer_reviews.title: Best tea tree oil shampoo for dry scalp that I have found.
customer_reviews.text: After having my second child I started suffering from a severely dry and itchy scalp. I tried multiple products to get relief and nothing worked until I got this shampoo from Maple Holistics. Within just a few days the itchiness was gone and my scalp started healing. I am over a year out and have had no more issues since using this shampoo. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: David Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Best Shampoo I've Found
customer_reviews.text: For context, I've tried a lot of natural/organic shampoos and while many of them are fine, for me personally they don't help with scalp flakes. I wear a lot of dark colors and it's very annoying to have to monitor my shoulders. I haven't seen a single flake from my scalp since using this product. It's made of good ingredients, smells nice (but not too strong), and lathers/rinses well. I'll buy it forever!
customer_reviews.author: s2hmhqP9quR

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Having tried countless shampoos in the past, I was and continue to be very impressed with this shampoo... It is great moisturizing shampoo...it lathers beautifully, and is extremely gentle, with a mild, pleasing scent. Get some in your eyes? NO problem... no burning!! This is, by far, the best shampoo I have every used, and shall continue to use it exclusively! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Skyhawk

customer_reviews.title: Bumps, flakes, and scabs gone! Soft, shiny hair.
customer_reviews.text: I have always struggled with bumps and scabs on my scalp. I don't know what causes my skin issues but I'm happy to say this shampoo has helped a lot. Within 2 washes, I no longer noticed any new bumps, and the flaky skin is now calm and smooth. I will eventually try the conditioner, but for now I've been using a vinegar/water rinse afterwards with a little conditioner on my ends. I don't want any more harsh chemicals near my scalp. Will buy more when I'm running low.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: An Ingredient Other Than Tea Tree Oil Is Giving Me Problems
customer_reviews.text: My past experiences with hair care products that contain tea tree oil have been generally positive. I got this shampoo to try to address some flaking issues. I've used about half of the bottle. However, since I've been using it two or three times a week, I've experienced more flaking and some significant itching. I've drawn the conclusion that maybe one of the other ingredients in this shampoo is causing my reaction.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Used and won't need a different one again.
customer_reviews.text: It's taken awhile for me to write my review because I wanted to test it for a good amount of time. I've been using this and the matching conditioner for awhile now and it has truly helped my dry scalp so much. I've had very dry skin all my life and always had an issue finding a shampoo/conditioner that worked (typical off the shelf brands didn't work.) I have noticed a great difference and the dry build up is gone and doesn't return. Smells nice. Only suggestion from me would be to use a pump top because the bottles are skinny and hard to compress. Maybe I'm just a weakling.
customer_reviews.author: Mcbeth1121
